# HollaDieWaldfee

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Lead Senior Watson [@sherlockdefi](https://twitter.com/sherlockdefi), Senior
Auditor for [Trust Security](http://trust-security.xyz) and OG Warden
[@code4rena](https://twitter.com/code4rena)

My audits for Sherlock are performed under the alias "roguereddwarf".

Check out my work in my [Audit
Portfolio](https://github.com/HollaDieWaldfee100/audits)

## Highlights

  * Ranked #4 on Code4rena 2023 leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #4 on Code4rena's 2023 leaderboard. So
far, I've earned $53k+ in awards, and have found 12 high and 20 medium
severity vul

  * [Placed 1st in Perennial's Sherlock audit](https://audits.sherlock.xyz/contests/79/leaderboard)

I was the Lead Senior Watson for this audit and placed 1st with 4 solo medium
findings.

  * [Placed 1st in DODO's Sherlock audit](https://audits.sherlock.xyz/contests/78/leaderboard)

I was the Lead Senior Watson for this audit and placed 1st with 1 solo medium
finding.

  * [Placed 1st in Reserve Protocol's Code4rena audit](https://code4rena.com/contests/2023-01-reserve-contest#top)

In this audit, I found 1 high severity vulnerability and 6 mediums, 1 of which
was a solo finding.

## Available for hire

I specialize in auditing Smart Contracts on EVM-based chains. For inquiries
and bookings, please contact me.

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=HollaDieWaldfee&source=HollaDieWaldfee-profile)

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HollaWaldfee100)
  * [Audit Portfolio](https://github.com/HollaDieWaldfee100/audits)
